remark: Tagged bottom at 2993m. Drilled from 2993m to 3035m. Increased mudweight from 1.40 sg to 1.45 sg . Drilling parameters: Flow 2090-2225 lpm / SPP 200-220 bar / String RPM 180 / ROP 2.5-8,5 m/hr / WOB 4-6 MT / TQ 15-20 kNm / ECD 1.59 SG. Had heavy stick slip with 10 MT WOB to start with, reduced WOB to 5 MT.
Continued drilling from 3035m to 3040m. Drilling parameters: Flow 2225 lpm / SPP 220 bar / String RPM 180 / ROP 5-6.5 m/hr / WOB 4-6 MT / TQ 18 kNm / ECD 1.59 SG. Hidra started at 3040m.

Continued drilling from 3040m to 3064m. Drilling parameters: Flow 2225 lpm / SPP 220 bar / String RPM 180 / ROP 3-6.5 m/hr / WOB 4-6 MT / TQ 15-18 kNm / ECD 1.59 SG.
Held pit drill.

Drilled 8 1/2" hole section from 3064 m to 3070 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 2200 lpm / SPP 220 bar / String RPM 180 / WOB 3-8 MT / Torque 11-22 kNm / ECD 1,59-1,60 sg. Controlled WOB and ROP due to stick slip tendencies. Observed drilling break at 3070 m MD.
Observed drilling break at 3070 m MD, ROP increased from 5 to 30 m/hr. Flowchecked well - ok - well static.

Continued drilling 8 1/2" hole section from 3070 m to 3095 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 2200 lpm / SPP 220 bar / String RPM 180 / WOB 3-8 MT / Torque 15-20 kNm / ECD 1,59-1,60 sg. Controlled WOB and ROP due to stick slip tendencies.
Observed drilling break at 3095 m MD, ROP increased from 5 to 35 m/hr. Flowchecked well - ok - well static.
Continued drilling 8 1/2" section from 3095 to 3103 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 2200 lpm / SPP 222 bar / String RPM 180 / WOB 4-8 MT / Torque 16-24 kNm / ECD 1,60 sg.
Performed SCR's.

Continued drilling 8 1/2" hole section from 3103 m to 3265 m MD. Added LCM materials to mud prior to entering reservoir. Drilling parameters : Flow 2200 lpm / SPP 220-231 bar / String RPM 180 / WOB 3-8 MT / Torque 11-20 kNm / ECD 1,61-1,62 sg. ROP 10-30 m/hrs. Observed top of Hugin reservoir on logs 3250 m MD / 2987 m TVD. Max gas at top reservoir lag depth 5 %.

Performed pit drill at 16:25 hrs. Good response from loggers and driller.

Drilled 8 1/2" hole section from 3265 m to 3302 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 2200 lpm / SPP 220-231 bar / String RPM 180 / WOB 3-8 MT / Torque 11-20 kNm / ECD 1,62-1,63 sg. ROP 30 m/hrs. Max gas 6%
Observed increase in active of ~1 m3 over 5 mins. Flowcheked well on trip tanks - ok - well static. Found that degassers had been started - volume from sandtraps overflowed into active.

Continued drilling 8 1/2" hole section from 3302 m to 3327 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 2100-2200 lpm / SPP 216-238 bar / String RPM 180 / WOB 3-8 MT / Torque 11-20 kNm / ECD 1,61-1,63 sg. Limited ROP to and cut back flowrate to 2100 lpm due to increasing ECD. Downlinked powerdrive to stop build. Got problems with mudpump#2 and mudpump#3.
Troubleshot mudpumps. Not able to start mudpump #3. Mudpump #2 gave wrong output on stroke setting. Decided to drill ahead using mudpump #1 only.
Continued drilling 8 1/2" hole section from 3327 m to 3346 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 2100 lpm / SPP 214 bar / String RPM 180 / WOB 3-6 MT / Torque 21 kNm / ECD 1,61 sg. ROP 30 m/hrs.
Drilled 8 1/2" hole section from 3346 m to 3385 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 2100 lpm / SPP 220 bar / String RPM 180 / WOB 2-5 MT / Torque 20-23 kNm /  ECD 1,61-1,62 sg / ROP 20-30 m/hrs.
Performed SCR's.

Continued drilling 8 1/2" hole section from 3385 m to section TD at 3510 m MD. Drilling parameters : Flow 2100 lpm / SPP 220 bar /  String RPM 180 / WOB 3-12 MT / Torque 13-23 kNm /  ECD 1,59-1,60 sg / ROP 10-30 m/hrs. Racked back one stand of drillpipe.
Circulated hole clean with 3 x bottoms up. Reciprocated stand while pumping. Parameters : Flow 2100 lpm / SPP 212 bar / String RPM 150-180. Observed clean shakers after 3 x bottoms up.
Took up down weight 195/149 MT. Recorded off bottom torque at 10/15/20 RPM - 14-16 kNm. Sent downlink to set LWD tools according to Schlumberger instructions.
Flowchecked well - well static. Meanwhile held toolbox meeting prior to POOH.
Pulled 5 stand wet from 3507 m to 3307 m MD. Pulling speed ~10 m/min. No overpull observed.
Flowchecked well - well static. Pumped 5 m3 1,65 sg slug.
POOH with 8 1/2" drilling BHA on 5 1/2" DP from 3307 m to 2780 m MD.
POOH with 8 1/2" drilling BHA on 5 1/2" DP from 2780 m to 2740 m MD inside 9 5/8" casing shoe. Recorded up down weight 163/137 MT. Recorded torque at 20 RPM - 7 kNm.
Flowchecked well -well static. Meanwhile inspected and serviced TDS. Dropped 2 3/4" drift with pigtail in drillpipe.
POOH with 8 1/2" drilling BHA on 5 1/2" DP from 2754 m to 1331 m MD.
Broke out x-over. Changed from 5 1/2" to 5" handling equipment. Re-inserted 2 3/4" drift into 5" DP as it would not pass the x-over.
POOH with 8 1/2" drilling BHA on 5" DP from 1331 m to 110 m MD.
Removed PS-21 slips. Inserted masterbushing and bowls. Worked to free 2 3/4" drift which was stuck in jar.
Freed 2 3/4" drift. Racked back jar/HWDP and 1 stand of 5" HWDP.
Held toolbox talk prior to laying out LWD/MWD/drilling assemblies.
Broke out and laid down NM HWDP. Removed RA-source. Broke out and laid down Isonic, Telescope, Ecoscope and Powerdrive.
Cleaned and tidied drillfloor.
General muster alarm. Crews mustered according to list. Non critical alarm.
Continued to clean and tidy drillfloor. Meanwhile changed rollers for IBOP actuator on TDS.

Prepared for picking up 5 1/2" DP from deck. 

Meanwhile 
-Moved power rollers on cantilever
-Prepared for running WL
-Inspected, cleaned and greased PS-21 slips
Held toolbox talk prior to inspection and service on AFT PRS.
Inspected and serviced AFT PRS. Found loose bar (54 cm / 560 g) sitting in hoses/junction box below upper drive.
Evaluated finding. Suspected drag chain in PRS beam.
Inspected drag chain in PRS beam. Could not identify bar (FG) comming from PRS beam.
Performed derrick inspection from PRS to crown block.

Removed lid and inspected inside PRS upper drive. Found rotational dragchain in AFT PRS upper drive to be damaged. Identified origin of loose bar (FG) to be cross member in rotational dragchain. Assessed damage. Decided to perform repair of dragchain.

Repaired rotational dragchain in AFT PRS upper drive.

Meanwhile :
-Built cable head for WL
-Laid out MDT tools
-Rigged load sensors on WL unit
Repaired rotational dragchain in AFT PRS upper drive. Meanwhile tested MDT tools
Repaired rotational dragchain in AFT PRS upper drive. Temporarily halted testing of MDT tools due to loading of drillpipe onto cantilever/pipe-deck.
Repaired rotational dragchain in AFT PRS upper drive. Meanwhile tested MDT tools.
Tested MDT tools. Calibrated weight sensor. Brought WL rigging equipment to drillfloor.
Rigged up sheaves and cable. Brought logging tools to drillfloor.
Held toolbox talk prior to making up logging string.
Made up MDT toolstring.
Tested MDT tools on surface prior to RIH.
Re-positioned lower sheave due to unfavorable cable allignment.
RIH with MDT logging string on 7/48 cable. Perfomed shallow test - negative.
POOH with MDT logging tools. Performed checks on surface - ok.
RIH with MDT logging string on 7/48 cable from surface to station #1 at 3245 m MD. Correlated MDT tool. Attempted to activate MDT probe - negative.
Pulled MDT tool from 3245 m to 2671 m MD inside 9 5/8" casing shoe. Troubleshot tool failure - negative.
POOH with MDT logging string on 7/48 cable from 2671 m MD to surface.
Checked cable, cable head and surface cables - ok.
Isolated and checked MDT string components as required.

General alarm - crews mustered according to list. Announced possible gas in wellhead area. Removed WL toolstring from well - well stable - stood by for securing well. Investigated alarm and found fault on gas sensor. Resumed work.
Continued isolating and checking MDT string components as required.
Found both MRPO pumps in MDT toolstring to be faulty. Only one back up MRPO pump available on rig. Discussed situation. Decided to run simplified string with only 1 pump.
Traced tools for simplifed MDT toolstring. Brought tools to drillfloor. Made up and tested simplified MDT toolstring.
RIH with simplified MDT toolstring on 7/48 cable.
RIH witth MDT toolstring on 7/48 cable from surface to 2700 m MD inside 9 5/8" shoe. Rested MDT toolstring for 30 min to allow for temperature adaption.
RIH with MDT toolstring on 7/48" cable from 2700 m to 3270 m MD.
Correlated toolstring and placed MDT probe at 3245 m MD sample point in Heather.
Obatined pressure point sample at 3245 m MD in Heather. Attmepted to RIH - cable stuck with MDT at 3345 m MD.

Worked MDT toolstring and found string to be stuck. No tension on cable head observed when pulling surface tension of max pull 12000 llbs - wire probably stuck/keyseated in formation. Depth on mechanical counter 3233 m MD.
Continued to work WL with max 12000 lbs pull. Observed movement of WL unit. Secured WL unit with chains. Checked sheave wheels on drillfloor.
Put 12000 lbs tension in WL and put on brake. Depth on mechancial counter 3232 m MD with 12000 lbs tension.

Worked WL several times. Slacked off to 5000 lbs and picked up to max tension 12000 lbs several tiems - not able to make progress. Prepared for doing cut and thread fishing on drillpipe. Prepared fishing procedure. Decided to do fluid sampling at stuck point in Heather prior to fishing.
Pumped to clear tool of mud. Activated MDT probe.
Stepped up MDT pump in increments. Performed MDT sampling at 3245 m MD according to Schlumberger procedure.
Perfomed MDT sampling at 3245 m MD. Observed 170 bar diff pressure over probe. Filled 2 ea 450 cc bottles with formation fluid. Contamination ~13%. Total volume pumped ~30 litres.
Worked WL up and down in attempt to get free - negativ. Ran probe out/in and re-attempted freeing WL - negative. Slacked off WL to 3000 lbs tension => depth on mechanical counter 3245 m MD.
Held pre-job meeting prior to rigging up for cut and thread fishing.

Put 7200 lbs tension on WL. Fitted T-clamp on 7/48 cable and slacked off WL. Cut 7/48 cable with 5-6 m loose end and fitted spear on same. Fitted spearhead overshot and 2 x fishing weights to winch side of wireline. Removed sheave wheel from TDS. Removed sheave wheel from aft samson post.
Rigged up for cut and thread fishing. Suspended upper sheave in dedicated sling in derrick. Suspended lower sheave in V-door above HTS, secured same with slings.
Held toolbox talk prior to performing cut and thread.
Picked up singel and made up x-over. Laid out single.
Held toolbox talk prior to inserting PS-30 automatic slips.
Rigged up and changed to PS-30 automatic slips. Slacked off wire and hung off in slips with T-bar.
Pull tested T-bar. Performed toolbox talk for continuation of operations.
Re-set grip on T-bar in order to get more slack on wire and be able to lay grapple/drain sub on the drilfloor. Ran WL up/down to test counter balance weights on wire - ok. Threaded first joint.
Picked up first joint. Made up grapple and drain sub. RIH with 5 1/2" DP single.

Observed damage on cable due to unfavorable angel when spinning in the drilpipe, wire partly cut through. Suspended WL in C-plate and cut off damaged wire. Fitted spearhead and fishing weights on winch side of wireline.
Rigged down upper sheave. Attached upper sheave in crown block. Removed 5" weco coupling and blind cap on top of TDS. Put on weco nut acting as wear bushing. Threaded WL through topdrive.
Ran 5 1/2" DP singles over 7/48 wireline from 13 m to 268 m MD according to cut and thread procedure.
Ran 5 1/2" DP singles over 7/48 wireline from 268 m to 780 m MD according to cut and thread procedure. Laid out singles #26 and #28 due to stuck protectors.
Laid out 5 1/2" DP singles on pipedeck. Measured and drifted joints. Simultaneoulsy re-arranged stands in derrick.
Held toolbox talk prior to continuing cut and thread.
Continued running 5 1/2" DP singles over 7/48 wireline from 780 m to 1090 m MD according to cut and thread procedure. Checked wireline and TDS top in coupling for wear every 25 joints.
Ran 5 1/2" DP singles over 7/48 wireline from 1090 m to 1438 m MD according to cut and thread procedure.
Laid out 5 1/2" DP singles on pipedeck. Measured and drifted joints. Moved weight bars on winch side of wiereline in order to move stress points. Checked rope socket - ok.
Laid out 5 1/2" singles on pipedeck. Cleaned and checked threads. Measured and drifted joints.
Held toolbox talk prior to continuing cut and thread operation.
Ran 5 1/2" singles over 7/48 wireline from 1438 m to 1500 m MD.
Wireline caught up behind AFT PRS arm. Removed wire and checked for damage - ok.
Continued running 5 1/2" singles over 7/48 wireline from 1500 m to 1640 m MD.
Cut back winch side of wireline. Re-built rope socket and fitted spearhead and new weights.
Continued running 5 1/2" singles over 7/48 wireline from 1640 m to 1750 m MD. Observed hydraulic leakage from TDS.
Repaired hydraulic leakage on TDS.
Continued running 5 1/2" singles over 7/48 wireline from 1750 m to planned side entry sub depth of 1850 m MD.

Held toolbox talk for installing side entry sub. Assessed weather conditions and forecast. High winds > 40 knots and unfavorable forecast. Not able to perform riding belt operations required to re-position upper sheave wheel. Decided to continue running 5 1/2" DP singels over wireline to shoe depth.
Continued running 5 1/2" singles over 7/48 wireline from 1750 m to 1989 m MD.
Ran 5 1/2" singles over 7/48 wireline from 1989 m to 2595 m MD. Winds 35- 40 knots.
Ran 5 1/2" singles over 7/48 wireline from 2595 m to 2704 m MD.
Held toolbox talk prior to rigging TDS work platform.
Lowered and positioned TDS work platform.
Pulled wireline through TDS and secured same. Installed 5" weco blind plug in TDS top-in coupling.
Retracted and secured TDS work platform.
Performed derrick inspection due to period of high winds.
Pressure tested TDS 5" weco blind plug and K5 manifold valve 5/10 min 20/345 bar. Re-routed wireline over TDS.
Made up 4 m 5" pup joint to 5" x 5 1/2" x-over, threaded wireline through same.
Changed to 5" inserts in elevator. Picked up 5" pup/x-over and made up same to string.
Held toolbox talk prior to removeing PS-30 automatic slips.
Removed PS-30 automatic slips, dressed same for 5" DP and re-installed in rotary. Ran in on 5" DP to 2707 m MD.
Took 9000 lbs tension on WL. Fitted T-bar to wireline and hung off on 5" DP.
Fitted WL in sideentry sub. Cut WL and built rope sockets on winch and well ends according to Schlumberger procedure. Built WL torpedo. Changed from 5 1/2" to 5" saver sub on TDS.

Waited on weather. Winds 60-70 knots.

Meanwhile :
-Inspected and greased PDM, HTS, IR, PS-21 and DP elevators
-Inspected TDS torque wrench
-Repaired trip tank pump
-Installed drag chain guide on AFT PRS
-Pressure tested standpipe and kill manifolds

Waited on weather. Winds 50-60 knots.

Meanwhile :
-Installed drag chain guide on AFT PRS
-Pressure tested standpipe and kill manifolds
Wind down to 45 knots. Performed derrick inspection after period of high winds. Assessed rigging alternatives for removal of upper sheave wheel in crown block.
Held toolbox talk prior to removing upper sheave wheel.
Barriered off drilfloor for aloft work. Brought rigging equipment to derrick. Rigged down upper sheave wheel.
Rigged down WL sheave wheel from crown block. Lowered sheave wheel to drillfloor. Re-made torpedo due to tangeled wires in derrick. Powered up WL. Cleared and tidied drillfloor.
Held toolbox talk for repositioning WL sheave.
Repositioned WL sheave in derrick. Attached wireline over sheave.
Held toolbox talk prior to making up side entry sub.
Made up side entry sub to toolstring according to Schlumberger instructions.
Held toolbox talk prior to testing IBOPs on TDS.
Rigged up swage with 1502 weco to TDS. Hooked up cement hose. Stopped for ESD test.

Halted operation for ongoing ESD test.

Meanwhile :
-Cleaned and tidied drillfloor and shaker areas
-Changed die holders and dies on TDS torque wrench
-Continued installation of dragchain guide on AFT PRS
Pressure tested upper/lower IBOP to 30/345 bar 5 /10 min. Meanwhile continued ESD testing.
Picked up stand of 5" DP and made up to side entry sub. Inserted rubber seals in side entry sub. Clamped 7/48 cable in side entry sub cut out.
RIH with 5" DP from 2707 to 2750 m MD, held wireline tension contant at ~7000 lbs.

Broke circulation at 9 5/8" shoe and stepped up rate to 700 lpm as limited by erosion figures for side entry sub. Circulated bottoms up. Standpipe pressure rose from 10 bar to 30 bar throughout circulation. Mud weight out 1,39 sg rising to 1,43 sg towards the end. Mud weight in 1,45 sg. Gas peaked at 7% and levelled out on 0,3% towards end of circulation.
Held toolbox talk prior to running into open hole. Meanwhile flowchecked well and allowed well to equalize due to pipe/annulus imbalance.

RIH with 5" DP from 2750 m to 2996 m MD, held wireline tension contant at ~7000 lbs. Made up TDS to each stand to limit backflow. At 2835 m MD, got indications on downhole tension that WL and fish were free, attempted to pull fish free with 12000 lbs WL tension - negative - WL still stuck.
RIH with 5" DP from 2996 m to 3202 m MD, held wireline tension contant at ~7000 lbs.  Made up TDS to each stand to limit backflow. Hole condtions good - no significant drag observed.

Broke circulation and cleaned grapple pumping 300 strokes at 1000 lpm. Observed imbalance pipe/annulus when stopped pumping - SPP 5 bar. Good corrspondance with downhole pressure of 430 bar read from log and 1,47 sg mudweight in annulus.
RIH with 5" DP from 3202 m MD and caught fish at 3221 m MD. Set down ~5 MT on fish and observed indication of succesful catch on surface and downhole WL tension.
Picked up 10 m while allowing wireline to slack off - observed surface and downhole WL tension decreasing.

Pulled 5" DP while feeding torpedo through upper and lower sheaves. Had to dismantle wire guides on lower sheave for torpedo to pass. Fitted T-bar and hung off wire in rotary. Slacked off wire and removed from depth counters on WL unit. Spooled torpedo onto WL drum and inserted WL back in depth counters.
POOH wet with 5" DP from 3167 m to 2710 m MD. Maintained ~5000 lbs tension in wirieline while spooling in.
Flowchecked well - well static - ok. Removed snatch block from wireline.
Pumped 5 m3 1,65 sg slug at 700 lpm and chased to drillfloor.
Released electrical weakpoint. Powered down logging unit.
POOH with WL inside 5 1/2" DP from 2710 m MD to surface.
Broke out side entry sub and laid down same. Cut loose WL from side entry sub. Rigged down lower sheave and secured upper sheave above V-door.
Held toolbox talk prior to changing handling equipment.
Changed slips segments. Re-activated guides in PS-30 automatic slips.
Broke out and and laid down 5" x 5 1/2" x-over with 5" pup joint.
POOH with 5 1/2" DP from 2703 m MD to surface.

Installed C-plate in rotary and hung off MDT toolstring. Broke off tool socket sitting in grapple. Parted and pulled toolstring sections using tugger. Broke off grapple and circulation sub and set back last stand of 5 1/2" DP.
Held toolbox talk prior to picking up jet sub and BOP test plug.
Cleared and tidied drillfloor. Picked up and made up jet sub. RIH on 5" DP from surface to 160 m MD.
Washed accross subsea wellhead with jet sub 4 times pumping at 3000 lpm.
Made up test plug and RIH with same on 5" DP. Landed test plug in subsea wellhead/wearbushing at 140 m MD. Flushed lines from cement unit and verified line up.
Tested 18 3/4" surface BOP against tests plug in subsea wellhead, 20/345 bar 5/10 min.

Tested 18 3/4" surface BOP against test plug in subsea wellhead, 20/345 bar 5 /10 min.

Meanwhile :
-Serviced TDS
-Removed 7/48 WL sheaves from derrick
-Changed elevators
-Cleaned and maintained drillfloor equipment
POOH with 5 1/2" DP from 300 m to 160 m MD. Broke out and laid down test plug.
POOH with 5" DP from 160 m MD to surface. Broke out and laid down jet sub.
Cleaned and tidied drillfloor prior to bringing in logging tools.
Held toolbox talk prior to running MDT toolstring.
Ran MDT toolstring in sections to 41 m MD using C-plate and tugger according to Schlumberger instructions.
Changed dies in IR. Made up AH-3 1/2" x 4 1/2" IF x-over to 5" DP stand. Made up x-over to MDT logging string.
Connected locomotive to docking head. Schlumberger tetsed MDT toolstring. Disconnected locomotive.
Held toolbox talk prior to RIH with MDT toolstring on 5" DP.
RIH with MDT toolstring on 5" DP from 41 m to 200 m MD. Max running speed 2 min/stand.
Removed master bushing and inserted PS-30 automatic slips in rotary.
RIH with MDT toolstring on 5" DP from 200 m to 734 m MD. Max running speed 2 min/stand.
Broke circulation and brought pumps up to 1800 lpm for 5 mins.
Installed 5" x 5 1/2" x-over. Changed to 5 1/2" handling equipment.
RIH with MDT toolstring from 734 m to 2267 m MD on 5 1/2" DP. Max running speed 2 min/stand. Circulated 500 lpm / 3 mins every 500 m.
RIH with MDT toolstring from 2267 m to 2751 m MD on 5 1/2" DP. Max running speed 2 min/stand. Circulated 500 lpm / 3 mins every 500 m.
Installed and made up 5 1/2" x 5" x-over and 5" pup joint for circulation.

Circulated 2 x bottoms up pumping at 2000 lpm / SPP 93 bar. Gas peaked at 6,6% on 1st bottom up and levelled out on 0,2% after 2nd bottom up. MW in/out 1,44/1,44 sg. Tested rheology and found mud to be in good condition.

Rigged upper and lower sheave wheels. Deactivated guides in PS-30 automatic slips. Lifted side entry sub with tugger and put locomotive into pipe. Spooled out approx 100 m on WL. Stabbed on side entry sub and lowered upper sheave wheel to centre position.
Made up side entry sub. Made up 5" stand for pumping down locomotive.  Pumped down locomotive while spooling out wireline. Pumpe rate 420-510 lpm / SPP 15-18 bar.
Increased pump rate to 1000 lpm / SPP 37 bar before latching locomotive in docking head. Observed 7 bar pressure increase when docking.
Powered up logging tools. Schlumberger tested MDT toolstring.
Clamped 7/46 cable in side entry cut out. Tested cable docking by applying 3500 lbs overpull on wireline for 5 mins - ok.
Held toolbox talk prior to RIH with MDT toolstring on 5" DP / 7/46 cable. Went through well control contingencies. Function tested hydraulic wireline cutter - ok.

RIH with 5" DP and 7/46 cable. Pumped 650 lpm when moving string downwards. Performed pressure point sampling in Hugin formation from 3252 m to 3412 m MD according to instructions from geologist. Hole condition good - no significant drag observed.
Correlated and took station at 3417,5 for fluid sampling. Performed fluid sampling. Lined up to trip tank and monitored well continously while performing sampling.
Performed fluid sampling at 3417,5 m MD. Obtained 2 ea 450 cc samples. Monitored well on trip tank.
Pumped 6 m3 slug and allowed active to stabilize. Correlated and took station at 3412,5 m MD.
Performed fluid sampling at 3412,5 m MD. Monitored well on trip tank. Observed downhole tool failure. Adequate sample not obtained from this station.

Troubleshot tool failure. Not able to function probe and pumps indicating problems with high voltage circuit. Checked surface equipment and confirmed ok. Discussed situation. Decided to start pulling out of hole.

Pulled logging tool free with ~5 MT overpull on block. Got overpull alarm 18 000 lbs on downhole tension. Communication with logging tools ok, but still unable to function high voltage circuit. POOH with 5" DP from 3412,5 m to 3244 m MD. Maintained 2500 lbs pull in wireline while pulling out.
POOH with 5" DP from 3244 m to 2757 m MD. Hole in good condtion - no significant drag observed.
Removed clamps from side entry sub. Took overpull on wireline and released locomotive from docking head.
Broke out side entry sub and laid down locomotive.
Checked locomotive and cable - ok. Cut cable loose from side entry sub.
Circulated bottoms up at 2000 lpm / 82-95 bar SPP. Gas peaked at 6,6% at bottoms up. MW in/out 1,45 sg.
Flow checked well - well static - ok.
Pumped 6 m3 1,62 sg slug and chased to drillfloor. Allowed active to stabilize.
Held toolbox talk. Changed inserts in PS-30 automaitic slips. Broke out and laid down 5" pup joint and  4 1/2" IF x 5 1/2" FH x-over.
POOH with MDT toolstring on 5 1/2" DP from 2751 m to 2550 m MD. Got problems with drawwork.
Troubleshot problems with drawwork.
POOH with MDT toolstring on 5 1/2" DP from 2550 m to 734 m MD.
Changed handling equipment from 5 1/2" to 5". Broke out and laid down 4 1/2" IF x 5 1/2" FH x-over.
POOH with MDT toolstring on 5" DP from 334 m to 41 m MD.
Parted and pulled MDT toolstring sections using C-plate and tugger. Found signs of short circuit in bulkhead coupling. Inner rubber packing on quicksilver probe was worn and torn.
Cleared and tidied drillfloor. Ran stand of 5" DP to help breaking off 5" saver sub.

Changed from 5" to 5 1/2" saver sub in TDS. Changed die holders and dies in TDS torque wrench. Pulled 5" stand and racked back. Broke and laid down 5" pup, 5" x 5 1/2" x-over and AH-3 1/2" x 4 1/2" IF x-over. Meanwhile packed and disconnected MDT and WL containers for backload/removal.

Cleared and tidied drillfloor. Brought casing running equipment to V-door. Removed PS-30 automatic slips. Installed Odfjell FMS in rotary. Positioned Odfjell casing tong on rails in front of IR. Prepared for rigging down WL sheave.
RD WL sheave and installed HTS roller section. Drifted pipe on setback.
Held tool box talk for RU to run 7" liner. Moved HTS rollers to aft end of cantiliver. Changed inserts in elevator and RU Odfjell csg tong.
Held tool box talk prior to running 7" liner. MU and RIH with shoe track and landing collar. Checked shoe and float collar for flow-through. Thread locked first 4 connections.

RIH with 7" liner from 40 m to 289 m MD, filling every 5th joint. Max running speed was 5 joints/hr

Installed pip-tag 0.34 m below top of collar on 1.92 m pup-joint in RA assembly. Estimated RA depth is 3216.17 m, but final depth will be given when 7" liner is set.
RIH with 7" liner from 289 m to 734 m MD, filling every 5th joint. Max running speed was 9 joints/hr.
RIH with 7" liner from 734 m to 842 m MD, filling every 5th joint. Max running speed was 5 joints/hr. Filled liner completely before picking up hanger assembly.

Changed to 5" DP elevators. P/U hanger/TSP packer assembly and MU same as per Weatherford procedure. Removed 7" FMS slips, installed master bushing. Filled PBR with Hi-visc mud. Took up/down weight 105/95 MT.
RD Odfjell csg tong. Removed HTS rollers. Cleared and cleaned rig floor.
PU 1 std of 5 1/2" HWDP. Changed to PS21 slips. RIH with 7" liner hanger on 5 1/2" HWDP from 850 m to 860 m MD.
RIH with 7" liner hanger on 5 1/2" HWDP from 860 m to 925 m MD.
Changed out 2 stds of 5 1/2" HWDP with 5 1/2" DP.
RIH with 7" liner from 925 m to 3392 m MD, filling every 5th stds. Max running speed was 8 stds/hr in cased hole and 5 stds/hr in open hole. Broke circulation at shoe at 2750 m, 1000 lpm / 53 bar.

Took 15 MT weight at 3392 m MD. MU TDS and attempted to work past tight spot with 20-30 MT. Up weight 181 MT / down weight 141 MT. Applied 9400 Nm RH torque when working string up. Released torque when working down.

Broke circulation, 230 lpm / 37 bar and established rate at 530 lpm / 49 bar. Washed down to tight spot applying max 20 MT. Observed pressure increasing to 60 bar. Shut down pumpe. Pressured up to 35 bar using cement unit - mismatch pumped vs theoretical volume. Suspected pressuring up against GT plug. Opened B-annulus valves to vent underneath plug and pressure dropped immediatly. Leakage observed across test plug despite steady pressure 35 bar indicating that plug did not vent into pipe when doing pressure test. Increased pumprate to 50 lpm and put 100 bar differential across plug, leakage decreased and pressure curve indicated that plug was sealing. Achieved steady pressure curve at 100 bar. Troubleshot casing tong / programming.
Function tested casing tong - ok.
Picked up tie-back adapter and checked seals and acme thread. Installed tie-back adapter in slips. Secured same with dogcollar.
Picked up first 10 3/4" joint and stabbed on to tie-back adapter. Had problems with Mrsk casing tong. Not able to get torque/turn curves on computer.
Investigated problem with casing tong.
Laid out tie-back adapter. Picked up joint #18 and #17 to test make up with Mrsk casing tong.
Attempted to make up connection, investigated missing torque reading on Mrsk system. Traced fault to be load cell or load cell amplifier.
Laid out jont #18 and #17 due to overtorque.
Rigged down Mrsk casing tong and frame.
Rigged up Odfjell casing tong and installed in rails in front of IR. Meanwhile held tollbox talk for re-installing safety net on FWD PRS.
Re-installed safety net around FWD PRS.
Powered up OWS casing tong. Installed travle cylinder.

Picked up tie-back connector and installed same in slips. Picked up 1 st joint and attempted to make up to tie-back adapter - not able to get torque/turn curve on Odfjell computer. Trouble shot situation. Changed gauges and valve on Odfjell tong.
RIH with 10 3/4" tie-back casing from surface to 108 m MD according to tally.
Picked up and made up 10 3/4" hanger / adjustable sub assy. Landed hanger in slips. Broke off casing hanger handling tool. Checked casing hanger.  Changed from BX3 to 5 1/2" BX elevator.
Picked up pre-made 5 1/2" HWDP (LS-1) with 10 3/4" Itco spear with PRS. Attempted to make up stand to TDS - negative - slipped in TDS back up dies.
Broke off TDS from stand. Set down stand in PRS. Lowered TDS and inspected torque wrench dies, removed swarf from dies. Re-attempted make up to stand in TDS - ok.

Ran 10 3/4" Itco spear 3 m into 10 3/4" tie-back casing and latched same. Took up/down weight 82/79 MT.  RIH with tie-back casing on 5 1/2" HWDP (LS-1). Put meter marks from casing hanger landing shoulder. Tagged with 4 MT at ~139,4 m, i.e. 30-40 cm shallow - no colour marks observed in WH B-annulus outlet. Re-attempted tag - same depth.

Evaluated situation. Checked drawings for potential hang-ups. Checked tally and joints left on deck - ok. Made two attempt to index pipe before tagging again - same depth. Sudden overpull of 14 MT observed after pulling some 30 cm above tag depth.

Decided to attempt to screw in 1-2 turn in order to verify tie-back adapter depth. RIH and tagged approx 10 cm deeper than earlier. Observed lower orange and white band in B-annulus outlet. Measured required distance for adjustment sub travel (15") and decieded to continue according to plan.

Set torqe limit to 2700 Nm. Made 3 attempts to enter tie-back adapter. Entered tie-back adapter on 4th attempt and observed weight increasing about 3-4 MT for each turn. Slacked off to neutral (80 MT) for each turn achieved. String stalled out at 2700 Nm after 5+ turns achieved. Took 10 MT overpull. Rotated at 1 rpm. Attempted make up to 10 000 Nm (optimum torque) - spear started to slip at 5500 Nm. Re-engaged spear. Adjusted torque setting to minimum torque 6600 Nm -spear started to slip at 5500 Nm. Re-enaged spear. Set torque limit to 10 000 Nm,  increased rotation to 3 RPM. String stalled out on 10 000 NM (optimum torque) - ok.
Took 30 MT overpull to check pre-tension in casing towards datum. Streched pipe approx 2" and observed lower white band through B-annulus outlet.
Rigged down Odfjell casing tong and removed PS-30 slips. Installed masterbushing and bowl.
Jammed torque wrench on TDS. Inspected equipment and found that wrong die-holders had been installed. Changed die-holders.
Held toolbox talk prior to picking up adjustment sub activation tool.
RIH with adjustment sub and located same at 28,4 m MD. Checked serial numbers on pipe. Made up TDS.

Pressured up on drillpipe to 140 bar to activate horizontal dogs. Pulled back 0,4 m and confirmed engaged in vertical dog profile by 9 MT overpull. Rotated string with 22 righthand turns. Observed colored band through B-annulus outlet to confirm adjustment sub collapsing. Increased overpull to 30 MT and continued rotating until TDS stalled out on 9 kNm and overpull reduced. Slacked off string to 28,4 m MD mark and waited for 2 min. Bleed off pressure on DP. Obtained a total of 17" travel on adjustment sub.
POOH with adjustment sub activation tool and racked back in derrick.
Made up Drillquip straddle cup tester.
RIH with straddle cup tester and located same at 28,4 m MD across metal seal in adjustment sub. Meanwhile held toolbox talk for pressure testing.
Lined up cement unit on standpipe. Performed line test to 380 bar.
Pressure tested adjustment sub (metal seal) to 380 bar / 10 min - ok. Kept B-annulus open throughout test.
RIH with straddle cup tester from 28,4 m and located same across tie-back adpater at 140,5 m MD.
Filled pipe with approx 1,8 m3 packer fluid prior to testing. Pressured up to 380 bar - observed leakage from B-annulus outlet - not able to obtain test.
Pulled back 10 m to put cuptester in blank pipe to test tool. Pressured up - not able to obtain test - straddle cup test leaking.
POOH with straddle cup tester from 130,5 m MD to surface. Laid out cup tester and inspected same. Found no tears or flaws, but OD reduced significantly (9,85"/9,70" vs originally 10,13")
Held toolbox talk prior to rigging casing running equipment.
Rigged up casing running equipment. Found a yellow sheared allen bolt on walkway along drillfloor. Suspended operation and evaluated situation.
Isolated aft PRS and TDS and inspected same with manrider. Found origin of bolthead to be from backside of aft PRS upper grip head.

Parked aft PRS for repair. Performed repair work on aft PRS. Broke out and re-thightended in total 24 allen/hex bolts with prescribed momentum (600 ft lbs). Replaced broken bolt. 

Meanwhile :
-Installed BX3 elevator in bails
-Brought Vetco/BOT equipment to cantilever
Repaired aft PRS. Meanwhile prepared for rigging casing running equipment.
Rigged up Odfjell casing tong adn PS-30 slips dressed for 10 3/4" casing.
Held toolbox talk for running 10 3/4" hanger running tool on 10 3/4" casing.
Made up 10 3/4" x 1502 swedge to 8 m 10 3/4" casing joint. Laid out casing joint.
Suspended operation due to reported fumes. Wind direction 330. Assessed situation. Decided to resume operation.
Picked up 10 3/4" casing hanger RT and hung off in slips. Picked up joint of 10 3/4" casing and made up to RT. Picked up joint with pre-made swedge.

Made up pup joint with pre-made 1502 swedge. RIH and landed casing hanger RT at 20 m MD. Set of weight of landing string. Entered hanger RT threads using chain tong. Made up RT with 9 lefthand turns using casing tong.
Held toolbox talk prior to pressure testing.
Rigged up 1502 chicksan from swedge to cement hose hub on drillfloor.
Lined up to cement pump and flushed lines. Performed line test to 380 bar - ok. Exhaust fumes detected on drillfloor.
Pressured up on cement unit and tested upper tie-back/adjustment sub/tie-back adapter to 380 bar /10 min - ok. Pumped and bled back 587 litres.

Exhaust fumes on drillfoor and drillers cabin. Suspended drillfloor operations. Checked wind and conditions every 30 min. Monitored well from shaker control room.

Meanwhile :
-Cleaned and tidied in moonpool
-Cleaned and tidied in wellhead module
-Housekeeping in heavy tool store

21:30 - shut down gas turbines to get working conditions on drillfloor.

Resumed work on drillfloor. Broke out casing hanger RT with 10 turns. Unable to latch elevator on 10 3/4" casing, had to use singel joint elevator and tugger. Pulled 10 3/4" landing string. Broke out RT. Broke out 1502 swedge.
Rigged down casing tong.
Rigged down casing tong. Removed PS-30 slips. Observed dropped object on drillfloor - hex/allen bolt head from aft PRS. Suspended operations for investigation. Fenced off drillfloor.
Inspected aft PRS. Discussed way forward. Parked and isolated aft PRS. Secured backside of aft PRS gripper head with cover and trailer straps for dropped object prevention.
Resumed operations. Removed BX3 elevator and installed 5 1/2" DP elevator. Cleared drillfloor from casing handing equipment.
Ran 2 x 5 1/2" DP singels and made up to MS-seal running tool. Meanwhile laid out DP singels on deck to cater for continued operations.
Made up control lines to MS-seal RT. Function tested and adjusted dogs and stroke on MS seal RT.

Locked MS seal running tool in surface WH, observed 0,4 l return - ok. Performed 10 MT overpull to confirm latch - ok. Set MS seal assembly by applying 4300 psi. Observed 1,62" travel / 3,5 liter returned fluid - ok.
Pressure tested MS seal through test port in surface wellhead to 380 bar / 10 min - ok.
Released dogs in MS seal RT by rotating 5 turns to the right.
POOH with MS seal RT on 5 1/2" DP stand. Broke RT tool and laid down.
Held toolbx talk before running bowl protector.
Made up bowl protector RT. RIH and set bowl protector at 20,10 m MD.
Broke out RT and laid down same. Laid out 2 joints of 5 1/2" DP.
Held toolbox talk and prepared for running casing drift. Experienced problems with programming PDM.
Troubleshot PDM. Unable to travel to port aft pipe bay.
Tested PDM - ok. Tested stabbing. Discussed issues related to pipe handling.
Picked up 9,567" casing drift and made up to 5 1/2" HWDP single.
RIH with 9,567" casing drift from surface to 140 m MD on 5 1/2" HWDP singels. Re-arranged pipe on cantilever deck.
RIH with 9,567" casing drift from 140 m to 245 m MD on 5 1/2" DP singles. Detected exhaust fumes on drillfloor.
Exhaust fumes on drillfloor. Made up TDS and spaced out for BOP. Abandoned drillfloor. Shut down one of the gas turbines to reduce exhaust fumes.
Resumed operations. Continued to RIH with 9,567" drift from 245 m to 580 m MD.
POOH with 9,567" drift on 5 1/2" DP from 580 m to 223 m MD. Laid out singles on deck when pulling out. Performed kick drill.

POOH with 9,567" drift on 5 1/2" HWDP from 223 m to surface. Laid out singles on deck when pulling out. Observed dropped object on drillfloor - half crest of external lock ring / simmer ring for pin, 70 mm x 2 mm / 10 grammes. Suspended operations for investigation. Fenced off drillfloor.
Inspected rig equipment. Found source of dropped object to be cherry picker main hydraulic lift cylinder. No risk of larger dropped object from equipment - lock ring served no purpose.

Resumed operations. Held toolbox talk. Made up GTV pulling tool to stand of drillpipe hanging in block. Ran stand carefully through BOP. RIH to 80 m MD on 5 1/2" HWDP singles. Observed leakage on BX-elevator.
Fixed BX elevator. Changed 3 ea hydraulic hoses/fittings running from TDS to BX elevator.
RIH with GTV pulling tool from 80 m to 130 m MD on 5 1/2" HWDP singles.
RIH with GTV pulling tool from 130 m to 600 m MD on 5 1/2" singles.
Tagged plug with 2 MT at 615 m MD.
Pulled back 1 joint and made up DP to TDS. Displaced his-vis at 2400 lpm. Pumped a total of 37 m3 1,03 sg completion fluid.
Held toolbox talk prior to releasing plug.
Due to unsactisfactory cleanliness of completion fluid, pumped additional 26 m3 at 2400 lpm.

Latched onto plug and confirmed by 10 MT overpull. No pressure observed on standpipe but slight gain in triptank indicating equlized plug. Rotated at 5 rpm righthand while holding 3 MT overpull, released plug with 10 turns, no gain observed. Pulled back 5 m and waited for elastomer element to relax.
RIH with plug to 620 m MD to confirm released. Pulled 5 1/2" single and gained 0,2 m3 in trip tank due to swabbing plug.
Pulled 3 x 5 1/2" singles while pumping at 200 lpm. Swabbing stopped when plug entered 10 3/4" casing.
POOH with GTV plug on 5 1/2" DP singles from 578 m to 145 m MD.
POOH with GTV plug on 5 1/2 HWDP singles from 145 m MD to surface.
Broke out and laid down GTV plug and pulling tool.
Made up secondary bowl protector pulling tool. RIH and latched secondary bowl protector. Strapped pipe while POOH, measured 20,45 m to tubing hanger landing shoulder. Made up kick assembly.
Held toolbox talk for rigging up tubing running equipment.
Positioned HTS and moved rollers on cantilever. Cleared drillfloor. Positioned control line reel on fwd pipe setback. Meanwhile installed NPR plug with ballseat in tailpipe joint.
Re-arranged kick joint. Re-booted PDM and tested same.

Changed to BX3 elevator. Positioned Odfjell casing tong on rails in front of IR, hooked up same to panel on aft pipe setback. Removed master bushing and installed PS-30 slips. Bulit scaffolding platforms for dropped object protection above tong operating panel and control line reel panel.
Held toolbox talk before running 7" tubing.

Picked up completion assy#1. Function tested ratcheting mule shoe - ok. Checked seals and rupture disk - ok. Hung off assy#1 in slips. Picked up and made up joint #265 with presintalled NPR plug / ball seat 1,98 m from collar. Picked up and made up 1 joint of tubing. Picked up and made up completion assy#2 / SB-3 injection packer. Checked packer element and slips.
RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing from 37 m to 72 m MD. Checked self filling of tubing - ok. Raised doubt about torque read back on jam computer.
Investigated deviation between tong gauge and jam coumputer. Found that wrong transducer was set up in the jam computer, with the consequence that the casing tong output too low torque.
Held toolbox talk prior to laying out undertorqued tubing. Laid out tubing joints #258 to #262.
Installed pipe guide in PS-30 slips.
Inspected box on joint #263 and found it to be damaged / gaulled. Broke off box and inspected pin thread - ok. Made up new coupling collar on joint#263 - ok.
Held toolbox talk prior to making up back-up assy#2 SB-3 injection packer.
Picked up and made up back-up assy#2 SB-3 injection packer, RIH and hung off in slips.
Picked up and made up 7" tubing joint. Raised doubt about torque setting on tong. Stopped operations for investigation.

Found casing tong to be programmed with wrong torque values. Optimum torque set to 15660 ft lbs instead of 15660 Nm. Two tubing connections on assy#2 overtorqued. No back-up assembly available. Discussed situation. Evaluated and discussed further actions with town. Got confirmation that VamTop thread should be good within 30% overtorque. Decided to do drift run through overtorqued couplings to verify no deformation or restrictions. 

Meanwhile :
-Repaired handrails and kick plates in derrick
-Removed 10 allen/hex bolts from fwd PRS
Rigged up tugger with Seawell adjustable drift sub. Performed drift run through 1st coupling (13,2 m) to 5,977" - ok. Perfomed drift run through assy#2 and 2nd coupling (21,2 m) to 5,80" - ok.
Held toolbox talk prior to continuing tubing running. Verified Odfjell jam computer with correct torque values.
RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing from 48 m to 238 m MD. Running speed 30 sec per joint. Checked self filling of tubing  - ok.
RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing from 238 m to 561 m MD. Running speed 30 sec per joint. Checked self filling of tubing - ok.
Handover for short change of Mrsk crew. Held toolbox talk for continued operations. Greased PS-30 and elevator.
RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing from 561 m to 750 m MD. Reduced running speed to 1 min per joint in 9 5/8" casing. Checked self filling of tubing - ok.
RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing from 750 m to 834 m MD.
Bad make up on joint #189, laid out same. Broke out box on joint #190. Inspected pin and made up new box on joint #190. Moved mobile cherry picker to aft part of drillfloor for use on aft PRS.
RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing from 834 m to 963 m MD.
Bad make up on joint #177,  laid out same. Broke out box on joint #178. Inspected pin and made up new box on joint #178.
RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing from 963 m to 1345 m MD.
Not able to make up joint #146, laid out same. Inspected box - negative. Laid out joint 145.
RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing from 1333 m to 1434 m MD.
Inspected threads on joint #134 - negative - laid out joint.
RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing from 1434 m to 1455 m MD.
Inspected threads on joint #129 - negative - laid out joint. Mrsk crew change and toolbox talk.
RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing from 1455 m to 1743 m MD.
RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing from 1743 m to 1938 m MD.
Bad make up on joint #90,  laid out same. Washed and inspected threads on pipedeck. Applied API mod lubeseal dope to pin ends on pipedeck.
RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing from 1938 m to 2164 m MD.
Held toolbox talk prior to picking up completion assy#3 DHSV. Counted joints left on deck 84 - ok.
Picked up completion assy#3 DHSV. Made up completion assy#3 and ran through RT. Isolated pipe guides on PS-30 slips.

PU and installed one tubing joint above TRSCSSV assembly. Flushed control line. Connected control line to TRSCSSV and leak tested to 570 bar/10 min. Bled pressure down to zero. Checked slips alignement. Made guide arrangement for control line from tubing to CL drum. Pressured up control line to 420 bar to keep TRSCSSV open while RIH.

RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing with CL and clamps from 2164 m to 2645 m MD. 

Up weight 172 MT / down weight 141 MT. Distance between up and down weight was 0.3 m.
Held tool box talk before entering 7" liner.
Lined up to pump down kill line and to be able to observe overflow from top of tubing. Verified line up with 15 bar.

RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing with CL and clamps from 2645 m to 2649 m MD. 

Closed annular BOP at 280 psi. Attempted to reverse circulate, neg. Leaked through annular. Closed annular BOP at 580 psi. Reverse circulated using clean brine at 50 lpm / 3 bar and 100 lpm / 3.5 bar to get a reference. Observed returns. Stopped circulating and opened annular BOP.

RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing with CL and clamps from 2649 m to 2659.8 m MD. 

Performed reverse circulation exercise 50-100 lpm / 3.5 bar. Moved string down in 30 cm increments from 2659.8 m to 2662.2 m and repeated reverse circulation exercise with same pressure response (50-100 lpm / 3.5 bar).

POOH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing with CL and clamps from 2662.2 m to 2644 m MD. PU 2.89 m pup joint to space out to be able to close annular without a coupling or a clamp in the interval. RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing from 2644 m to 2662.2 m MD.
Performed reverse circulation exercise 50-100 lpm / 3.5 bar. Moved string down in 20 cm increments from 2662.2 m to 2662.8 m.

Performed reverse circulation exercise 50-100 lpm / 3.5 bar. Moved string down in 20 cm increments from 2662.8 m to 2664.3 m. Had 1 bar increase in pressure from 2663.4 m. Had overflow response on tubing while RIH at 2664.3 m before flow was cut off - indicating that the lower most seal had entered 7" liner PBR. Confirmed the situation by reverse circulating 50 lpm up to 8.6 bar with no returns. Stopped circulating. Measured 7.24 m stick-up. TOL found at 2662.85 m.

POOH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing with CL and clamps from 2664.3 m to 2631 m MD. Calculated and performed space-out with pup A,D,E, and F, leaving lower most seal on seal stem stung in by 75 cm (2.2 m from end of string).

Held tool box talk prior to PU tubing hanger. PU and MU tubing hanger with handling tool to space-out pup joints sitting in the slips. Secured control line with clamp on pup joint coupling. RD control line cable sheave and terminated cable to TH. Wrapped control line 5 times and fed control line thru TH using swagelok fittings above and below hanger. Plugged off penetration holes in TH with 3/8" NPT blind plugs. Leak tested TH fittings through 1/8" test port to 35 bar/5 min.
Leak tested TH fittings through 1/8" test port to 380 bar/10 min using BOT pump.
Held tool box talk. Lifted TH hanger above slips. Removed PS30 slips and installed master bushings. Installed C-plate and landed TH in C-plate. BO handling tool and LO same.

Installed communication collar onto hanger and made 5 right hand turns until it shouldered out on TH. Wrapped CL 3 times around hanger neck. Connected TRSCSSV CL to 1/4" communication port at btm of communication collar. 

PU tubing hanger RT with 7" #29 pup joint. Backed out THRT piston retaining screws and MU THRT to communication collar with 8 turns left hand rotation. Connected TRSCSSV CL to 1/4" communication ports on top of THRT.
Leak tested TRSCSSV control line to 570 bar/10 min using BOT test pump. Kept 520 bar pressure on line while RIH. Screwed in THRT piston retaining screws. Control-measured RT and pup-joint lengths.
Stopped trip tank and drained production riser.

Removed C-plate. Ran in with THRT below rotary. Installed bowls. PU and MU joints for landing string. Up weight 173 MT / down weight 144 MT. RIH with 7" 29# S13%Cr tubing, TH and THRT on landing string from 2647 m to 2665,2 m MD. Got indications when ratcheting muleshoe and seals entered 7" liner PBR. Landed TH on no-go shoulder in surface tubing head. SO weight.

Leak tested TH in port 1 and 2 on surface well head to 70 bar/5 min to verify that TH had landed correctly. Engaged TH lock down ring by applying 207 bar. Performed pull test with 15 MT overpull to verify TH lock down. SO weight.
Pressure tested TH seal through test port 1 and 2 on surface WH to 35/380 bar for 5/10 min using Vetco pump.

Held toolbox talk. Installed 7" #29 Vam Top P x 5 1/2" FH B swedge and 2" Wetco pump in sub with lo-torque valve. RU cmt hose/cmt unit to lo-torque valve and flushed CMT line to rig floor. Performed line test to 345 bar / 10 min using packer fluid. Observed 1.6 bar drop (0.46%). Performed line test without cmt hose and observed 0.3 bar drop.

Pressured up tubing against NPR plug at 2648 m MDRT to 30 bar / 10 min to check tubing integrity before initiating packer setting. 70 ltrs pumped. Kept 570 bar on TRSCSSV CL. Observed 0.3 bar drop. 

Closed TRSCSSV. Bled down to 5 bar above TRSCSSV and function tested TRSCSSV for 10 min. Bled back 36 ltrs. Observed 0.2 bar drop. Equalized and opened TRSCSSV.
Continued to pressure up tubing to 345 bar. Held pressure for 15 min to set SB-3 packer and test tubing. 1050 ltrs pumped. Observed 1.5 bar drop (0.43%).

Bled down pressure to 320 bar. 60 ltrs bled back. Closed TRSCSSV and bled off pressure above to 250 bar. Bled back 35 ltrs. Inflow tested TRSCSSV with 70 bar diff / 30 min. Inflow test OK.
 
Bled off pressure above TRSCSSV to 10 bar. Bled back 120 ltrs. Inflow tested TRSCSSV with 310 bar diff / 30 min. Inflow test OK. Equalized and opened TRSCSSV using 157 ltrs. Bled off pressure in tubing to zero. Bled back 800 ltrs.

RU cmt hose/cmt unit to A-annulus to leak test packer from above and TH from below. Opened B-annulus to vent. Performed line test to 35/380 bar for 5/10 min pumping brine at 70 lpm. Observed 1.8 bar drop (0.47%) on high pressure test.

Pressured up A-annulus to leak test packer from below and TH from below to 35/380 bar for 5/10 min pumping brine at 70 lpm. Kept tubing open on drill floor and 570 bar on TRSCSSV CL. Pumped 125 ltrs and observed 0.2 bar drop on low pressure test. Pumped 1130 ltrs (total) and observed 2.1 bar (0.5%) drop on high pressure test. Had flow on both tubing and B-annulus while pressuring up A-annulus due to ballooning effect. No flow observed when pumps was shut in. Bled pressure down to zero and had 1100 ltrs in return. Closed TRSCSSV.
Held tool box meeting. Released landing string by 9 right hand turns. POOH and LD landing string.  Changed to 5 1/2" handling equipment.

Held tool box meeting. PU and MU XO 5 1/2" FH box x 3 1/2" IF box to centralizer / BPV running adaptor / BPV. RIH and landed BPV on 5 1/2" DP in TH at 20.3 m. Sat down string weight to extend locking keys and energize seals. Rotated string 8 1/2" turns clockwise to lock mandrel and free running adaptor in J-slot. POOH with running string and LD RT.
POOH with running string and LD RT.
RD completion handling equipment.
PU 2 joints of 5 1/2" HWDP and RIH and drained riser.
ND and pulled diverter.

Continued ND diverter. Went trough SJA and procedure with day crew. Attached slings to slick joint. Prepared barriers, handrails and slings. Lifted out diverter. Installed outer ring and master bushings. Loosened nuts on slick joint.
Held tool box talk and reviewed SJA and procedures. Disconnected tension cylinders in WH module.
ND NT2 connection on BOP. Informed production department to shut in well at 12.30.
Waited on production  to shut in well. Meanwhile removed 2 HP hoses connected to WH.
ND slick joint and BOP.
Dismantled scaffolding on NT2 connection in moonpool and installed slings on riser. RU for disconnecting riser NT2 connection and disconnected same.

Dismantled scaffolding in moonpool. PU riser and terminated control lines on well head. Installed carrier on HTS. Installed hatch on weather deck and master bushings on rig floor. Hoisted riser to rig floor and retracted same.

Disconnected control lines from communication collar and hoisted same to rig floor. Installed hatch in moonpool. Installed outer ring and master bushings on rig floor. Installed anti vibration ring on TH. Removed one control line exit block on multi bowl. Unwrapped required length of CL around TH neck and fed control line through dedicated port on multi bowl. Fed high pressure packings and fittings onto CL and MU fittings to threads in multi bowl. Installed dart in BPV in TH by hand. Installed 137 VG seal ring on top of multi bowl and VG 63 seal ring on top of TH.

Removed hatch to F-4. Lowered spacer spool down from rig floor with TDS until NT2 box connector landed out on top of WH. MU locking dogs until connection leveled out. MU actuation screws with 800 ft-lbs. Disconnected slings and removed same. 

Pressure tested and energized BT seals through ports 7/8. Tested VG 63 connection trough test port 9/10 to 35 bar/5 min.

Tested TH void, grafoil seals and BT seals 35/380 bar for 5/10 min via test port 5/6.

MU ferrule swagelock fittings for CL. Installed seal rings and CL exit block. Installed seal ring on top of spacer spool.
Skidded cantiliver 1.5 m starboard and as far aft as possible to be able to possition crane for lifting XMT.

Held tool box meeting. Connected crane hook to one of the two chackles in the end of the chain hoist and wire sling. Disconnected transport plate. Lifted XMT to wireline deck and landed it on wooden beams, where it hung suspended in crane hook and resting on wooden beams with 1 MT.
Skidded rig to sea fastening position to gain access for lifting XMT with the port aft deck crane.
Held tool box meeting. Attempted to lift XMT from wireline deck to F-4 wellhead. Could not reach F-4. Decided to skid further to starboard.
Skidded 0.6 m further starboard and reached max skidded position starboard and fwd (sea fastning position).

Unable to reach F-4 and F-5 with port aft deck crane. Evalutated alternative methode for landing of XMT. 

Meanwhile held toolbox meeting and went through procedures and SJA with day crew.

Skidded port and aft out to F-4.

Meanwhile lined up from CMT onto F-12 kill valve. Lined up over choke manifold to equalize above TRSCSSV. Tested lines. Equalized TRSCSSV with 84 bar and opened same. Started production from F-12.
Held time-out for safety. Talked about everyones right to stop the operation if anything is unclear or confusing. Went through operational plan and safety aspects involved.
Installed staircase to cantiliver.
Removed big moonpool hatch and lowered XMT to moonpool. Re-installed hatch.
Transfered XMT from turtle to weather deck and skidded cantiliver to port and fwd to position XMT in center.
Waited on production to shut in well.
Attached TDS to XMT. Positioned and disconnected base plate.

Skidded rig fwd and port to position XMT over F-4 for final installation.

Meanwhile bled down all pressures on F-12 to zero bar.
Moved hatch on weather deck to allow XMT to pass through. Lowered XMT until 1 m above F-4 spacer spool.

Held tool box meeting. Lowered XMT on to spacer spool with TDS and verified correct orientation.

MU graylock connection. Re-built scaffolding around XMT for proper working environment. Checked alignment of flanges between flow hose and XMT. Pressure tested seal ring 35 bar/10 min through test port 3/4 on spacer spool to confirm proper seal.
Installed flow line spool. Disconnected lifting wire from TDS. Connected flexible flow line to flow line spool. Re-installed hatch.

Postphoned XMT tests to assist production to start up F-12. Lined up from CMT onto F-12 kill valve. Lined up over choke manifold to equalize above TRSCSSV. Tested lines. Equalized TRSCSSV and opened same. Started production from F-12.
Held tool box meeting. Opened HMV with Seawell test pump. Lined up from cmt unit and connected hose on KWV. Performed line test to 20 bar for 5 min.
Trouble shoot line up from cmt unit through valves and hose from moonpool to KWV due to failing line test. Detected exhaust fumes in WH area.
Exhaust fumes in well head area. Abandoned WH. Shud down on of the gas turbines to reduce exhaust fumes.
Performed line test to 30/380 bar for 5/10 min against KWV. 2.2 bar drop on high pressure test.
Attempted to pressure test XMT body and VG 63 ring to 30/380 bar for 5/10 min against dart in BPV. Failed due to leaking dart/BPV.
Held tool box talk. Removed XMT tree cap. Opened HMV. RIH with retrieving tool for dart on stinger and retrieved dart. POOH with dart. RIH and installed new dart. Flushed XMT. Closed HMV.
Attempted to pressure test XMT body and VG 63 ring to 30/380 bar for 5/10 min against dart in BPV. Failed due to leaking dart/BPV.
Pulled dart and BPV. Installed a new BPV and dart. Flushed XMT.
Pressure tested XMT body and VG 63 ring to 30/380 bar for 5/10 min against dart in BPV. 2.5 bar drop on high pressure test.

Pressured up to 130 bar against BPV & dart. Close MMV and bled off pressure above MMV to 10 bar. Inflow tested MMV to 120 bar differential pressure for 15 min. 1.9 bar drop.

Equalized pressure above MMV. Opened MMV and closed HMV. Bled of any pressure above HMV to 10 bar. Inflow test HMV to 120 bar differential pressure for 15 min. 2.4 bar drop.

Equalized pressure across HMV. Opened HMV. Bled off pressure. Closed valves.
Removed XMT tree cap. Opened HMV. RIH with retrieving tool for dart on stinger and retrieved dart.  POOH with dart. Pulled BPV from TH.
Re-installed XMT tree cap. Close HMV. Test three cap 380 bar/10 min against SV. Bled off pressure.
Pressure test TRSCSSV CL exit block to 570 bar/15 min, using BOT pump. Test ok. No indication that TRSCSSV opened. Bled off 155 ml on line.
Evalutated options for flushing flowline and made plan for flowline test. Handover with new crew.
Held tool box meeting. Hooked up flexible hose and lined up for pressure testing flowline. Flushed through XMT PWV, KWV and lo-torque to cement unit with pot-water.
Attempted to pressure test flow line and XMT to 30/345 bar for 5/10 min. Observed leak at flange on flexible hose.

Inspected, greased and torqued up flange on flow line flexible hose.

Meanwhile worked on varco bolts on AFT PRS and installed tension cylinders on F-14.

Inspected, greased and torqued up flange on flow line flexible hose.

Meanwhile worked varco bolt on AFT PRS and installed tension cylinders on F-14.
Flushed through XMT  to cmt unit prior to testing flowline. Pressure tested flow line and XMT to 30/345 bar for 5/10 min. 1.1 bar drop on low pressure test and 1.7 bar drop on high pressure test.

Commisioned XMT.

Meanwhile worked on varco bolts on AFT PRS and installed tension cylinders on F-14.

Installed instrumentation on F-4 XMT. Connected umbilical to bulk head plate.

Meanwhile changed out chain on HTS, emptied trip tank and repaired sensor on gate valve shakers. Started to change out one tension cylinder on F-14. Carried out work scope with climbers in derrick.
Waited on production to restart after production shut-down.

Energized instrumentation on XMT.

Meanwhile changed out one tension cylinder on F-14 and cleaned area. lined up from cement unit onto F-12 kill valve. Lined up over choke manifold. Equalized TRSCSSV with 94 bar and opened same. Started production from F-12. Carried out work scope with climbers in derrick.

Function tested XMT pressure transmitters.

Meanwhile retrieved base plate from weather deck to moonpool. Carried out work scope with climbers in derrick.

Mounted umbilical termination plate on XMT.

Meanwhile performed housekeeping on cantilever. Carried out work scope with climbers in derrick.

Tested annulus pressure transmitters on XMT.

Meanwhile worked on Varco bolts on aft PRS. Built suspended scaffolding for repair on fwd PRS. parked and landed BOP on test stump.

Function tested PWV and HMV on XMT with process operator present. Feed back on valve position to process control room read OK.

Meanwhile continued building suspended scaffolding for fwd PRS in paralell with securing bolts on aft PRS.

Commenced commisioning of XMT. Verified documentation from Vetco Gray and Aibel. Performed pre-commisioning checks.

Meanwhile continued building suspended scaffolding for fwd PRS in paralell with securing bolts on aft PRS. Started to lift parts for fwd PRS onto scaffolding.

Performed pre-commisioning checks of valves on XMT. Function tested MMV and SV and XMT with process operator present. Feed back on valve position to control room read OK.

Meanwhile continued building suspended scaffolding for fwd PRS in paralell with securing bolts on aft PRS.

Performed pre-commisioning checks of valves on XMT. Function tested MMV and SV and XMT with process operator present. Feed back on valve position to control room read OK.

Meanwhile continued building suspended scaffolding for fwd PRS in parallell with securing bolts on aft PRS.

Commisioned XMT.

Meanwhile performed derrick inspection with climbers and worked on BOP.

Waiting on WL equipment and personnel to arrive on rig. Completed commisioning of XMT 38 hrs ahead of plan.

Meanwhile erected scaffolding platform for fwd PRS and performed 3-montly maintenance on BOP.

Waiting on WL equipment and personnel to arrive on rig. 

Meanwhile erected scaffolding platform for fwd PRS and performed 3-montly maintenance on BOP.

Waiting on WL equipment and personnel to arrive on rig. 

Meanwhile performed derrick inspection with climbers and performed 3-montly maintenace on BOP.

Prepared for RU wireline equipment and tested dual and trippel BOP's.

Meanwhile equalized above DHSV on F-12 with cmt unit to re-start production. Observed leak in F-12 XMT.
Meanwhile performed derrick inspection with climbers and performed 3-montly maintenace on BOP.

Prepared for RU wireline equipment and tested dual and trippel BOP's.

Meanwhile identified leak on F-12 XMT to be in MEG injection valve. 
Meanwhile performed derrick inspection with climbers and performed 3-montly maintenace on BOP.

Prepared for RU wireline equipment and tested dual and trippel BOP's.

Meanwhile continued to work on scaffolding platform for fwd PRS.

Held tool box meeting. Spotted WL equipment on rig floor and hooked up BCU and pump skids. Prepared riser and BOP for lifting down to moonpool area.

Meanwhile changed MEG injection valve on F-12 and re-tested valve to 325 bar/30 min.

Spotted WL equipment on rig floor and hooked up BCU and pump skids. Prepared riser and BOP for lifting down to moonpool area.

Meanwhile equalized above DHSV on F-12 with cmt unit to re-start production. Production on F-12 started 02:00.
Meanwhile built scaffolding bridge from cantiliver to Schlumberger WL deck (port aft leg).

Held tool box meeting. Hooked up chicksan line in moonpool from cmt unit to both F-12 and F-4 with seperate high pressure hoses.  Lifted off hatch on F-4. Leak tested line from cmt unit to XMT KWV with LTV4 closed 30/380 bar for 5/10 min. Dropped 0.75 bar/10 min. Verified no pressure under XMT cap and removed same.
Lowered the assembled XO, pump-in sub and short riser section through the rotary with tugger from drill floor and connected it to XMT. Installed BOP's with dual placed on top of tripple BOP.
Built scaffolding around BOP's to enabling handling of riser above BOP's.
Installed riser sections to rig floor.
Opened SV. Attempted to pressure test riser sections and BOP's without sucess. Identified leak in FMC drain valve. Bled off pressure. Closed SV. Attempted to rectify the leaking valve without sucess.

Built grease injection head, with cable head already installed and one lubricator section on rig floor. PU grease injection head and one lubricator section using tugger. Connected two more lubricator sections. Installed sheave wheels.

Meanwhile drained riser and installed new FMC drain valve.

PU and MU WL toolstring for pulling NPR plug and installed in lubricator. Connected lubricator at in-situ sub. 

Opened SV partly and flushed and filled lubricator with packer fluid using cement unit through KWV. Attempted to pressure test wireline rig-up. Observed leak in lubricator XO below tool catcher.

Meanwhile transfered operation of HMV and TRSCSSV to pump skid in moonpool. Production operator was present during the transfer.
BO lubricator and toostring. Changed leaking o-ring in XO. MU toolstring and re-connected lubricator.

Opened SV partly and flushed and filled lubricator with packer fluid using cement unit through KWV. Pressure tested wireline rig-up 30/185 bar for 5/10 min against HMV. Dropped 0.75 bar/10 min. Filled lubricator with 700 ltrs. Bled off pressure in lubricator/rig-up to cmt unit. Closed SV.

Pressured up and opened HMV and TRSCSSV using WL pump in moonpool. Observed for leak on well head for 10 min. No leak observed. Opened SV.
Started RIH WL toolstring for pulling NPR plug. Production shut down at 23:57 and had shut down WL unit. Re-powered up WL unit.

RIH WL toolstring for pulling NPR plug from surface to TRSCSSV at 496 m MDRT. Found that TRSCSSV was closed. Decided not to wait for cmt unit - production needed to equalize and open TRSCSSV on F-12 to re-start production. 

Hooked up pump on rig floor to needle valve on lubricator to equalize and open TRSCSSV in F-4. Ran through TRSCSSV at 496 m MDRT and verified that it was fully open.

Continued RIH WL toolstring for pulling NPR plug to 2600 m MDRT using running procedures for new cables. Running speed 40 m/min. Did not bleed off pressure while RIH and had 11-12 bar in well at 2600 m. Up weight 710 kg / Hanging weight 530 kg / RIH weight 422 kg.

RIH and latched GS pulling tool into NPR plug at 2649.7 m. Jared down to equalize ports in the plug. Waited 15 min for pressure across plug to equalize. Pressure dropped to 10 bar. Bleed off pressure. Released NPR plug by jaring up once. Got 150 kg increase in string weight. Waited 30 min to allow elements to retract.

POOH with NPR plug. Observed that weight dropped back to up weight while POOH. RIH and latched GS pulling tool into NPR plug at 2649.7 m. Pressured up well to 10 bar. Jarred down to equalize ports in the plug. Waited 15 min for pressure across plug to equalize. No pressure drop observed. 

Released NPR plug by jaring up 105 hits. Adjusted stress point on cable after 60 hits with jar. Got approx 300 kg increase in string weight. Bleed off pressure. Waited 30 min to allow elements to retract.
POOH with NPR plug on 7/32 cable, worked through TRSCSSV at 496 m with 200 kg overpull. Closed SV using 42 turns and closed HMV. Bled off pressure in XMT, riser and lubricator to closed drain.
RD lubricator and cut wireline as per Seawell instructions. LD and inspected BHA and NPR plug. Plug had only small rift on rubber element.
Held tool box meeting. Attempted to increase TRSCSSV CL pressure to 570 bar with Seawell pump without sucess. Max pressure of 540 bar with Seawell pump. RU Vetco pump to pressure up CL to 570 bar.

Lined up to test 7" tubing/liner to 380 bar through KWV with cmt pump. Opened LTV1 and LTV2. Pressured up well to test 7" tubing/liner to 35/380 bar for 5/10 min against EZSV plug at 3448 m MDRT. Pumped 1195 ltrs and bled back 1190 ltrs. Dropped 1.6 bar/10 min. Closed HMV. Adjusted TRSCSSV CL pressure to 520 bar.

Installed Check Valve in test line to cmt unit. Performed line test from cmt unit against KWV to 185 bar/10 min. Dropped 0.9 bar/10 min. Bled down to 10 bar on cmt unit to inflow test Check Valve. Bled down  pressure between KWV and Check Valve to closed drain.

Meanwhile RU scaffolding and lubricator to grease head.

RU additional lubricator sections needed for perforation runs. Lifted riser sections to rig floor. Modified scaffolding to a higher level to be able to assemble lubricator. RU to run 7/16" electric line. Prepared grease injection head. MU cable head with PGGT.

Installed cable head and PGGT with bottom nose in riser. Connected WL riser at in-situ sub. Confirmed correct line up from cmt unit. Opened SV and KWV on XMT. Filled up riser and leak tested WL rigup to 30/185 bar for 5/10 min with cmt pump against HMV. Dropped 0.6 bar/10 min. Bled off pressure to closed drain. Closed SV.
Drained lubricator. Broke riser at in-situ sub and LD toolstring. Cleared drill floor. Installed nitrogen rack and regulator on drill floor.
Discussed method for PU and MU perforation guns due to uncertified lifting cap.
Held tool box meeting prior to PU and MU gun sections.
Checked GR/CCL on rig floor. Shut down power to Schlumberger unit to follow procedure for MU perforation guns. Closed off rig floor, WH and XMT. Made PA announcement.

PU gun sections from cantiliver onto HTS with crane. Connected toolstring and swivel to gun and lifted guns into riser using both tugger and electric line with gooseneck. Connected and hung off all three gun sections in C-plate.
MU firing head, PGGT and new swiwel to guns hung off in riser. Connected upper toolstring to guns hanging in riser and armed guns. PU tension on toolstring and took off C-plate.
Connected lubricator and tested in-situ sub to 30/185 bar for 5/10 min with Seawell test pump. Ok.
Opened HMV and observed 2 bar WHP. Verified TRSCSSV was open. Opened SV and RIH with 4.5" TCP guns on 7/16" electric line from surface to 3442 m MD. Up weight 2850 kg / Running weight 1500 kg.

Bled 50 bar WHP down to zero through closed drain. Correlated guns to shooting depth using GR. Hanging weight 2570 kg. Fired guns and perforated interval #1 from 3408.5 m to 3422.0 m MD. Positiv confirmation that guns had fired, but observed no increase in WHP.

POOH and logged GR/CCL to above production packer. POOH with perforation guns to OOH. Powered down logging unit at 70 m below seabed. Made PA announcement and pulled cable head into tool catcher. Closed SV to verify BHA OOH.

Closed HMV. Observed no WHP. Opened bleed to closed drain as a precaution. Opened needle valve and confirmed that lubricator was empty and that the well was on vacuum.

Broke lubricator at in-situ sub. BO and LD guns using sertified lifting sub. Observed that all shots had fired.
PU gun sections from cantiliver onto HTS with crane. MU lifting sub and lifted guns into riser. Connected and hung off all three gun sections in C-plate.
Built and tested new cable head. Checked CCL on rig floor. Shut down power to Schlumberger unit according to procedure for MU perforation gun.
MU firing head, CAL-B and new swiwel to guns hung off in riser. Connected upper toolstring to guns hanging in riser and armed guns.
Continued connecting upper toolstring to guns hanging in riser and armed guns. PU tension on toolstring and took off C-plate.
Connected lubricator and tested in-situ sub to 30/185 bar for 5/10 min with Seawell test pump. Ok. Opened HMV and observed 0 WHP. Verified TRSCSSV was open. Opened SV.

RIH with 4.5" TCP guns on 7/16" electric line from surface to 3300 m MD. 

Meanwhile worked on synergi report for derrick, performed general maintenace and prepared BOP for pressure test.
Correlated depth to 2 m pup-joint in 7" liner at 3228.38-3230.42 m tally depth / 3229.5 -3231.5 m WL dept correlated with GR on reservoar log using CCL.

RIH with guns to shooting depth. No WHP. Up weight 2985 kg / Running weight 1540 kg. Hanging weight 2330 kg. Fired guns and perforated interval #2 from 3395.0 m to 3408.5 m MD. 

No obvious indication that guns has fired, but observed short circuit in string and CCL stopped working. Observed no increase in WHP. PU weight increased with 100 kg (3100 kg).
POOH with perforation guns from 3390 m to 1800 m MD.

POOH with perforation guns from 1800 m to OOH. Powered down logging unit at 70 m below seabed. Made PA announcement and pulled cable head into tool catcher. Closed SV to verify BHA OOH. Closed HMV. Observed no WHP. Opened bleed to closed drain as a precaution. Opened needle valve and confirmed that lubricator was empty and that the well was on vacuum. Broke lubricator at in-situ sub. Confirmed that guns had not fired.

Disarmed guns and removed firing head. Found leak in rope socket/cable head which caused short circuit in toolstring. Built and tested new cable head. Checked CCL on rig floor. Shut down power to Schlumberger unit according to procedure for MU perforation gun.

MU firing head, CAL-B and new swiwel to guns hung off in riser. Connected upper toolstring to guns hanging in riser and armed guns. PU tension on toolstring and took off C-plate. Connected lubricator and tested in-situ sub to 30/185 bar for 5/10 min with Seawell test pump. Ok. Opened HMV and observed 0 WHP. Verified TRSCSSV was open. Opened SV.
RIH with 4.5" TCP guns on 7/16" electric line from surface to 701 m MD.
POOH with perforation guns from 701 m to 360 m MD due to weak CCL signal.
Schlumberger discussed with town and confirmed that CCL was ok. RIH with 4.5" TCP guns on 7/16" electric line from 360 m to 3408 m MD.

Correlated depth to 2 m pup-joint in 7" liner at 3228.38-3230.42 m tally depth / 3229.5 -3231.5 m WL dept correlated with GR on reservoar log using CCL. RIH with guns to shooting depth. No WHP. Fired guns and perforated interval #2 from 3395.0 m to 3408.5 m MD. Positiv indication that guns fired.

POOH with perforation guns from 3390 m to OOH. Powered down logging unit at 70 m below seabed. Made PA announcement and pulled cable head into tool catcher. Closed SV to verify BHA OOH. Closed HMV. Observed no WHP. Opened bleed to closed drain as a precaution. Opened needle valve and confirmed that lubricator was empty and that the well was on vacuum. Broke lubricator at in-situ sub. Confirmed that guns had fired.

Connected lubricator and tested in-situ sub to 30/185 bar for 5/10 min with Seawell test pump. Ok. Opened HMV and observed 0 WHP. Verified TRSCSSV was open. Opened KWV. Pumped /bullheaded 3 m3 100% MEG at 180 lpm and 8 bar into well with cmt pump to provide cusion above closed TRSCSSV. Displaced MEG to above TRSCSSV by chasing it with 5.5 m3 packer fluid at 180 lpm and 8-20 bar. WHP started to increase after approx. 3 m3 packer fluid pumped.

Pumped 300 ltrs 100% MEG and displaced line with 500 ltrs packer fluid to fill XMT cross with 100% MEG. Closed TRSCSSV and HMV. Leak tested XMT cross to 123 bar / 10 min against closed HMV. Dropped 1.1 bar / 10 min. Bled off pressure to zero bar. Closed KWV.
Broke lubricator at in-situ sub. BO and LD guns using certified lifting sub.
BO and LD guns using certified lifting sub. Observed that all shots had fired.
RD lubricatoor on rig floor. Disconnected and pulled riser sections above BOP to rig floor.
Opened HMV and confirmed 0 WHP below. Closed HMV and opened KWV. Leak tested XMT cross to 123 bar / 10 min against closed HMV. Dropped 0.6 bar / 10 min. Bled off pressure to zero bar. Closed KWV.
Held tool box meeting. RD hydraulic BOP hoses. Disconnected  WL BOP's and transfered to overhead crane in moonpool. Transported BOP's to main deck. Dismantled scaffolding around BOP's.
Installed tree cap and tested same 35/380 bar for 5/10 min against closed SV using Seawell test pump and 100% MEG. Bled off pressure.
RD HP line from XMT KWV to cmt unit. Installed 1502 weco blind cap outside KWV and opened KWV. Leak tested KWV cap to 35/380 bar for 5/10 min aginst closed SV using Seawell test pump and 100% MEG.

Transfered operation of HMV and TRSCSSV to platform system/production. Filled in and signed "Well handover document" and handed over well from Volve D&W to Mrsk Production at 09:00. 

Meanwhile RD scaffolding on rig floor and cleared rig floor of excess equipment.

Removed scaffolding around moonpool hatch and installed hatch.
